macro.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNUSED
macro.info: This macro is used to flag unused function parameters to GCC, useless here

macro.name: CHECK_STOPPED
macro.info: Macro to check if the XSLT processing should be stopped will return from the function

macro.name: CHECK_STOPPED0
macro.info: Macro to check if the XSLT processing should be stopped will return from the function with a 0 value

macro.name: CHECK_STOPPEDE
macro.info: Macro to check if the XSLT processing should be stopped will goto the error: label

macro.name: DEBUG_MEMORY
macro.info: should be activated only when debugging libxslt. It replaces the allocator with a collect and debug shell to the libc allocator. Use configure --with-mem-debug to activate it on both library

macro.name: DEBUG_MEMORY_LOCATION
macro.info: should be activated only when debugging libxslt. DEBUG_MEMORY_LOCATION should be activated only when libxml has been configured with --with-debug-mem too

macro.name: IS_XSLT_ELEM
macro.info: Checks that the element pertains to XSLt namespace

macro.name: IS_XSLT_NAME
macro.info: Checks the value of an element in XSLT namespace

macro.name: IS_XSLT_REAL_NODE
macro.info: check that a node is a 'real' one: document, element, text or attribute

macro.name: LIBXSLT_DOTTED_VERSION
macro.info: the version string like "1.2.3"

macro.name: LIBXSLT_PUBLIC
macro.info: This macro is needed on Win32 when using MSVC. It enables the client code to access exported variables. It should expand to nothing when compiling this library itself, but must expand to __declspec(dllimport) when a client includes the library header and that only if it links dynamically against this library.

macro.name: LIBXSLT_VERSION
macro.info: the version number: 1.2.3 value is 1002003

macro.name: LIBXSLT_VERSION_STRING
macro.info: the version number string, 1.2.3 value is "1002003"

macro.name: WITH_XSLT_DEBUG
macro.info: Activate the compilation of the debug reporting. Speed penalty is insignifiant and being able to run xsltpoc -v is useful. On by default

macro.name: WITH_XSLT_DEBUGGER
macro.info: Activate the compilation of the debugger support. Speed penalty is insignifiant. On by default unless --without-debugger is passed to configure

macro.name: XSLT_DEFAULT_URL
macro.info: The XSLT "vendor" URL for this processor

macro.name: XSLT_DEFAULT_VENDOR
macro.info: The XSLT "vendor" string for this processor

macro.name: XSLT_DEFAULT_VERSION
macro.info: The default version of XSLT supported

macro.name: XSLT_GET_IMPORT_INT
macro.info: a macro to import intergers from the stylesheet cascading order

macro.name: XSLT_GET_IMPORT_PTR
macro.info: a macro to import pointers from the stylesheet cascading order

macro.name: XSLT_LIBXSLT_NAMESPACE
macro.info: This is the libxslt namespace for specific extensions

macro.name: XSLT_MAX_SORT
macro.info: Max number of specified xsl:sort on an element

macro.name: XSLT_NAMESPACE
macro.info: The XSLT specification namespace

macro.name: XSLT_NORM_SAXON_NAMESPACE
macro.info: This is Nom's namespace for SAXON extensions

macro.name: XSLT_PAT_NO_PRIORITY
macro.info: specific value for pattern without priority expressed

macro.name: XSLT_REGISTER_FUNCTION_LOOKUP
macro.info: registering macro, not general purpose at all but used in different modules

macro.name: XSLT_REGISTER_VARIABLE_LOOKUP
macro.info: registering macro, not general purpose at all but used in different modules

macro.name: XSLT_SAXON_NAMESPACE
macro.info: This is Michael Kay's Saxon processor namespace for extensions

macro.name: XSLT_XALAN_NAMESPACE
macro.info: This is the Apache project XALAN processor namespace for extensions

macro.name: XSLT_XT_NAMESPACE
macro.info: This is James Clark's XT processor namespace for extensions

function.name: xslAddCall
function.info: Add template "call" to call stack

return.info: : 1 on sucess 0 otherwise an error may be printed if WITH_XSLT_DEBUG_BREAKPOINTS is defined

function.name: xslDropCall
function.info: Drop the topmost item off the call stack

function.name: xslHandleDebugger
function.info: If either cur or node are a breakpoint, or xslDebugStatus in state where debugging must occcur at this time then transfer control to the xslDebugBreak function

function.name: xsltAddKey
function.info: add a key definition to a stylesheet

return.info: 0 in case of success, and -1 in case of failure.

function.name: xsltAddStackElemList
function.info: add the new element list at this level of the stack.

return.info: 0 in case of success, -1 in case of failure.

function.name: xsltAddTemplate
function.info: Register the XSLT pattern associated to cur

return.info: -1 in case of error, 0 otherwise

function.name: xsltApplyAttributeSet
function.info: Apply the xsl:use-attribute-sets

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltApplyImports
function.info: Process the xslt apply-imports node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltApplyOneTemplate
function.info: Process the apply-templates node on the source node, if params are passed they are pushed on the variable stack but not popped, it's left to the caller to handle them back (they may be reused).

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

arg.name: templ
arg.info: if is this a real template processing, the template processed

arg.name: params
arg.info: a set of parameters for the template or NULL

function.name: xsltApplyStripSpaces
function.info: Strip the unwanted ignorable spaces from the input tree

function.name: xsltApplyStylesheet
function.info: Apply the stylesheet to the document NOTE: This may lead to a non-wellformed output XML wise !

return.info: the result document or NULL in case of error

arg.name: params
arg.info: a NULL terminated arry of parameters names/values tuples

function.name: xsltApplyStylesheetUser
function.info: Apply the stylesheet to the document and allow the user to provide its own transformation context.

return.info: the result document or NULL in case of error

arg.name: params
arg.info: a NULL terminated arry of parameters names/values tuples

function.name: xsltApplyTemplates
function.info: Process the apply-templates node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltAttrListTemplateProcess
function.info: Do a copy of an attribute list with attribute template processing

return.info: a new xmlAttrPtr, or NULL in case of error.

arg.name: target
arg.info: the element where the attributes will be grafted

function.name: xsltAttrTemplateProcess
function.info: Process the given attribute and return the new processed copy.

return.info: the attribute replacement.

function.name: xsltAttrTemplateValueProcess
function.info: Process the given node and return the new string value.

return.info: the computed string value or NULL, must be deallocated by the caller.

function.name: xsltAttribute
function.info: Process the xslt attribute node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltCalibrateAdjust
function.info: Used for to correct the calibration for xsltTimestamp()

function.name: xsltCallTemplate
function.info: Process the xslt call-template node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltCheckExtPrefix
function.info: Check if the given prefix is one of the declared extensions

return.info: 1 if this is an extension, 0 otherwise

function.name: xsltChoose
function.info: Process the xslt choose node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltCleanupGlobals
function.info: Unregister all global variables set up by the XSLT library

function.name: xsltCleanupTemplates
function.info: Cleanup the state of the templates used by the stylesheet and the ones it imports.

function.name: xsltComment
function.info: Process the xslt comment node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

struct.name: xsltCompMatch
struct.info: Data structure used for the implementation of patterns. It is kept private (in pattern.c)

function.name: xsltCompilePattern
function.info: Compile the XSLT pattern and generates a list of precompiled form suitable for fast matching.

return.info: the generated pattern list or NULL in case of failure

arg.name: runtime
arg.info: the transformation context, if done at run-time

function.name: xsltCopy
function.info: Process the xslt copy node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltCopyNamespace
function.info: Do a copy of an namespace node. If node is non-NULL the new namespaces are added automatically. This handles namespaces aliases

return.info: a new xmlNsPtr, or NULL in case of error.

function.name: xsltCopyNamespaceList
function.info: Do a copy of an namespace list. If node is non-NULL the new namespaces are added automatically. This handles namespaces aliases

return.info: a new xmlNsPtr, or NULL in case of error.

function.name: xsltCopyOf
function.info: Process the xslt copy-of node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltDebug
function.info: Process an debug node

function.name: xsltDecimalFormatGetByName
function.info: Find decimal-format by name

function.name: xsltDoSortFunction
function.info: reorder the current node list accordingly to the set of sorting requirement provided by the arry of nodes.

arg.name: nbsorts
arg.info: the number of sorts in the array

struct.name: xsltDocument
struct.info: Data structure associated to a parsed document

function.name: xsltDocumentComp
function.info: Pre process an XSLT-1.1 document element

function.name: xsltDocumentElem
function.info: Process an XSLT-1.1 document element

function.name: xsltDocumentFunction
function.info: Implement the document() XSLT function node-set document(object, node-set?)

function.name: xsltDocumentSortFunction
function.info: reorder the current node list list accordingly to the document order

struct.name: xsltElemPreComp
struct.info: The in-memory structure corresponding to element precomputed data, designed to be extended by extension implementors.

function.name: xsltElement
function.info: Process the xslt element node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltElementAvailableFunction
function.info: Implement the element-available() XSLT function boolean element-available(string)

function.name: xsltEvalAttrValueTemplate
function.info: Evaluate a attribute value template, i.e. the attribute value can contain expressions contained in curly braces ({}) and those are substituted by they computed value.

return.info: the computed string value or NULL, must be deallocated by the caller.

function.name: xsltEvalGlobalVariables
function.info: Evaluate the global variables of a stylesheet. This need to be done on parsed stylesheets before starting to apply transformations

return.info: 0 in case of success, -1 in case of error

function.name: xsltEvalOneUserParam
function.info: ctxt: the XSLT transformation context name: a null terminated string giving the name of the parameter value a null terminated string giving the XPath expression to be evaluated

return.info: 0 in case of success, -1 in case of error.

function.name: xsltEvalStaticAttrValueTemplate
function.info: Check if an attribute value template has a static value, i.e. the attribute value does not contain expressions contained in curly braces ({})

return.info: the static string value or NULL, must be deallocated by the caller.

arg.name: found
arg.info: indicator whether the attribute is present

function.name: xsltEvalTemplateString
function.info: Evaluate a template string value, i.e. the parent list is interpreter as template content and the resulting tree string value is returned This is needed for example by xsl:comment and xsl:processing-instruction

return.info: the computed string value or NULL, must be deallocated by the caller.

function.name: xsltEvalUserParams
function.info: ctxt: the XSLT transformation context params: a NULL terminated array of parameters name/value tuples

return.info: 0 in case of success, -1 in case of error

function.name: xsltEvalXPathPredicate
function.info: Process the expression using XPath and evaluate the result as an XPath predicate

return.info: 1 is the predicate was true, 0 otherwise

arg.name: nsNr
arg.info: the number of namespaces in scope

function.name: xsltEvalXPathString
function.info: Process the expression using XPath and get a string

return.info: the computed string value or NULL, must be deallocated by the caller.

function.name: xsltExtElementLookup
function.info: Looks up an extension element. ctxt can be NULL to search only in module elements.

return.info: the element callback or NULL if not found

functype.name: xsltExtInitFunction
functype.info: A function called at initialization time of an XSLT extension module

arg.name: URI
arg.info: the namespace URI for the extension

function.name: xsltExtModuleElementLookup
function.info: Looks up an extension module element

return.info: the callback function if found, NULL otherwise.

function.name: xsltExtModuleFunctionLookup
function.info: Looks up an extension module function

return.info: the function if found, NULL otherwise.

function.name: xsltExtModuleTopLevelLookup
function.info: Looks up an extension module top-level element

return.info: the callback function if found, NULL otherwise.

functype.name: xsltExtShutdownFunction
functype.info: A function called at shutdown time of an XSLT extension module

arg.name: URI
arg.info: the namespace URI for the extension

arg.name: data
arg.info: the data associated to this module

function.name: xsltFindDocument
function.info: Try to find a document within the XSLT transformation context

return.info: the desired xsltDocumentPtr or NULL in case of error

function.name: xsltFindElemSpaceHandling
function.info: Find strip-space or preserve-space informations for an element respect the import precedence or the wildcards

return.info: 1 if space should be stripped, 0 if not, and 2 if everything should be CDTATA wrapped.

function.name: xsltFindTemplate
function.info: Finds the named template, apply import precedence rule.

return.info: the xsltTemplatePtr or NULL if not found

function.name: xsltForEach
function.info: Process the xslt for-each node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltFormatNumberConversion
function.info: format-number() uses the JDK 1.1 DecimalFormat class:

arg.name: result
arg.info: the place to ouput the result

function.name: xsltFormatNumberFunction
function.info: Implement the format-number() XSLT function string format-number(number, string, string?)

function.name: xsltFreeAttributeSetsHashes
function.info: Free up the memory used by attribute sets

function.name: xsltFreeCompMatchList
function.info: Free up the memory allocated by all the elements of comp

function.name: xsltFreeCtxtExts
function.info: Free the XSLT extension data

function.name: xsltFreeDocumentKeys
function.info: Free the keys associated to a document

function.name: xsltFreeDocuments
function.info: Free up all the space used by the loaded documents

function.name: xsltFreeExts
function.info: Free up the memory used by XSLT extensions in a stylesheet

function.name: xsltFreeGlobalVariables
function.info: Free up the data associated to the global variables its value.

function.name: xsltFreeKeys
function.info: Free up the memory used by XSLT keys in a stylesheet

function.name: xsltFreeNamespaceAliasHashes
function.info: Free up the memory used by namespaces aliases

function.name: xsltFreeStackElemList
function.info: Free up the memory allocated by elem

function.name: xsltFreeStyleDocuments
function.info: Free up all the space used by the loaded documents

function.name: xsltFreeStylePreComps
function.info: Free up the memory allocated by all precomputed blocks

function.name: xsltFreeStylesheet
function.info: Free up the memory allocated by sheet

function.name: xsltFreeTemplateHashes
function.info: Free up the memory used by xsltAddTemplate/xsltGetTemplate mechanism

function.name: xsltFreeTransformContext
function.info: Free up the memory allocated by ctxt

function.name: xsltFunctionAvailableFunction
function.info: Implement the function-available() XSLT function boolean function-available(string)

function.name: xsltFunctionNodeSet
function.info: Implement the node-set() XSLT function node-set node-set(result-tree)

function.name: xsltGenerateIdFunction
function.info: Implement the generate-id() XSLT function string generate-id(node-set?)

function.name: xsltGetExtData
function.info: Retrieve the data associated to the extension module in this given transformation.

arg.name: URI
arg.info: the URI associated to the exension module

function.name: xsltGetKey
function.info: Lookup a key

return.info: the nodeset resulting from the query or NULL

arg.name: value
arg.info: the key value to look for

function.name: xsltGetNamespace
function.info: Find the right namespace value for this prefix, if needed create and add a new namespace decalaration on the node Handle namespace aliases

return.info: the namespace node to use or NULL

function.name: xsltGetNsProp
function.info: Similar to xmlGetNsProp() but with a slightly different semantic

return.info: the attribute value or NULL if not found. It's up to the caller to free the memory.

function.name: xsltGetQNameURI
function.info: This function analyzes name, if the name contains a prefix, the function seaches the associated namespace in scope for it. It will also replace name value with the NCName, the old value being freed. Errors in the prefix lookup are signalled by setting name to NULL.

return.info: name is not prefixed.

arg.name: name
arg.info: pointer to the initial QName value

function.name: xsltGetSpecialNamespace
function.info: Find the right namespace value for this URI, if needed create and add a new namespace decalaration on the node

return.info: the namespace node to use or NULL

function.name: xsltGetTemplate
function.info: Finds the template applying to this node, if style is non-NULL it means one needs to look for the next imported template in scope.

return.info: the xsltTemplatePtr or NULL if not found

function.name: xsltGetXIncludeDefault
function.info: return the default state for XInclude processing

return.info: 0 if there is no processing 1 otherwise

function.name: xsltIf
function.info: Process the xslt if node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltInitCtxtExts
function.info: Initialize the set of modules with registered stylesheet data

return.info: the number of modules initialized or -1 in case of error

function.name: xsltInitCtxtKeys
function.info: Computes all the keys tables for the current input document. Should be done before global varibales are initialized.

function.name: xsltInitElemPreComp
function.info: Initializes an existing xsltElemPreComp structure. This is usefull when extending an xsltElemPreComp to store precomputed data. This function MUST be called on any extension element precomputed data struct.

arg.name: comp
arg.info: an xsltElemPreComp (or generally a derived structure)

function.name: xsltIsBlank
function.info: Check if a string is ignorable

return.info: 1 if the string is NULL or made of blanks chars, 0 otherwise

function.name: xsltKeyFunction
function.info: Implement the key() XSLT function node-set key(string, object)

function.name: xsltLoadDocument
function.info: Try to load a document within the XSLT transformation context

return.info: the new xsltDocumentPtr or NULL in case of error

arg.name: URI
arg.info: the computed URI of the document

function.name: xsltLoadStyleDocument
function.info: Try to load a document within the XSLT transformation context

return.info: the new xsltDocumentPtr or NULL in case of error

arg.name: URI
arg.info: the computed URI of the document

function.name: xsltLoadStylesheetPI
function.info: This function tries to locate the stylesheet PI in the given document If found, and if contained within the document, it will extract that subtree to build the stylesheet to process doc (doc itself will be modified). If found but referencing an external document it will attempt to load it and generate a stylesheet from it. In both cases, the resulting stylesheet and the document need to be freed once the transformation is done.

return.info: a new XSLT stylesheet structure or NULL if not found.

function.name: xsltMatchPattern
function.info: Determine if a node matches a pattern.

arg.name: node
arg.info: a node in the source tree

function.name: xsltMessage
function.info: Process and xsl:message construct

arg.name: inst
arg.info: The node containing the message instruction

function.name: xsltNamespaceAlias
function.info: Read the stylesheet-prefix and result-prefix attributes, register them as well as the corresponding namespace.

function.name: xsltNeedElemSpaceHandling
function.info: Returns whether that stylesheet requires white-space stripping

return.info: 1 if space should be stripped, 0 if not

function.name: xsltNewDocument
function.info: Register a new document, apply key computations

function.name: xsltNewElemPreComp
function.info: Creates and initializes an xsltElemPreComp

return.info: the new and initialized xsltElemPreComp

function.name: xsltNewStyleDocument
function.info: Register a new document, apply key computations

function.name: xsltNewStylesheet
function.info: Create a new XSLT Stylesheet

return.info: the newly allocated xsltStylesheetPtr or NULL in case of error

function.name: xsltNewTransformContext
function.info: Create a new XSLT TransformContext

return.info: the newly allocated xsltTransformContextPtr or NULL in case of error

function.name: xsltNextImport
function.info: Find the next stylesheet in import precedence.

return.info: the next stylesheet or NULL if it was the last one

function.name: xsltNumber
function.info: Process the xslt number node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltNumberFormat
function.info: Convert one number.

function.name: xsltParseGlobalParam
function.info: parse an XSLT transformation param declaration and record its value.

function.name: xsltParseGlobalVariable
function.info: parse an XSLT transformation variable declaration and record its value.

function.name: xsltParseStylesheetAttributeSet
function.info: parse an XSLT stylesheet preserve-space element and record elements needing preserving

function.name: xsltParseStylesheetCallerParam
function.info: parse an XSLT transformation param declaration, compute its value but doesn't record it.

function.name: xsltParseStylesheetDoc
function.info: parse an XSLT stylesheet building the associated structures

return.info: a new XSLT stylesheet structure.

function.name: xsltParseStylesheetFile
function.info: Load and parse an XSLT stylesheet

return.info: a new XSLT stylesheet structure.

function.name: xsltParseStylesheetImport
function.info: parse an XSLT stylesheet strip-space element and record elements needing stripping

function.name: xsltParseStylesheetInclude
function.info: parse an XSLT stylesheet strip-space element and record elements needing stripping

function.name: xsltParseStylesheetOutput
function.info: parse an XSLT stylesheet output element and record information related to the stylesheet output

function.name: xsltParseStylesheetParam
function.info: parse an XSLT transformation param declaration and record its value.

function.name: xsltParseStylesheetProcess
function.info: parse an XSLT stylesheet adding the associated structures

return.info: a new XSLT stylesheet structure.

function.name: xsltParseStylesheetVariable
function.info: parse an XSLT transformation variable declaration and record its value.

function.name: xsltParseTemplateContent
function.info: parse a template content-model Clean-up the template content from unwanted ignorable blank nodes and process xslt:text

arg.name: templ
arg.info: the container node (can be a document for literal results)

function.name: xsltPreComputeExtModuleElement
function.info: Precomputes an extension module element

return.info: the precomputed data

function.name: xsltPrintErrorContext
function.info: Display the context of an error.

function.name: xsltProcessingInstruction
function.info: Process the xslt processing-instruction node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltProfileStylesheet
function.info: Apply the stylesheet to the document and dump the profiling to the given output.

return.info: the result document or NULL in case of error

arg.name: params
arg.info: a NULL terminated arry of parameters names/values tuples

arg.name: output
arg.info: a FILE * for the profiling output

function.name: xsltQuoteOneUserParam
function.info: ctxt: the XSLT transformation context name: a null terminated string giving the name of the parameter value a null terminated string giving the parameter value

return.info: 0 in case of success, -1 in case of error.

function.name: xsltQuoteUserParams
function.info: ctxt: the XSLT transformation context params: a NULL terminated arry of parameters names/values tuples

return.info: 0 in case of success, -1 in case of error.

function.name: xsltRegisterAllElement
function.info: Registers all default XSLT elements in this context

function.name: xsltRegisterAllExtras
function.info: Registers the built-in extensions

function.name: xsltRegisterAllFunctions
function.info: Registers all default XSLT functions in this context

function.name: xsltRegisterExtElement
function.info: Registers an extension element

return.info: 0 in case of success, -1 in case of failure

arg.name: URI
arg.info: the URI associated to the element

arg.name: function
arg.info: the actual implementation which should be called

function.name: xsltRegisterExtFunction
function.info: Registers an extension function

return.info: 0 in case of success, -1 in case of failure

arg.name: URI
arg.info: the URI associated to the element

arg.name: function
arg.info: the actual implementation which should be called

function.name: xsltRegisterExtModule
function.info: Register an XSLT extension module to the library.

return.info: 0 if sucessful, -1 in case of error

function.name: xsltRegisterExtModuleElement
function.info: Registers an extension module element.

return.info: 0 if successful, -1 in case of error.

function.name: xsltRegisterExtModuleFull
function.info: Register an XSLT extension module to the library.

return.info: 0 if sucessful, -1 in case of error

function.name: xsltRegisterExtModuleFunction
function.info: Registers an extension module function.

return.info: 0 if successful, -1 in case of error.

function.name: xsltRegisterExtModuleTopLevel
function.info: Registers an extension module top-level element.

return.info: 0 if successful, -1 in case of error.

function.name: xsltRegisterExtPrefix
function.info: Registers an extension namespace

return.info: 0 in case of success, -1 in case of failure

arg.name: URI
arg.info: the URI associated to the extension

function.name: xsltRegisterExtras
function.info: Registers the built-in extensions. This function is deprecated, use xsltRegisterAllExtras instead.

function.name: xsltRegisterTestModule
function.info: Registers the test module

function.name: xsltRunStylesheet
function.info: Apply the stylesheet to the document and generate the output according to output SAX and IObuf. It's an error to specify both SAX and IObuf.

return.info: the number of by written to the main resource or -1 in case of error.

arg.name: params
arg.info: a NULL terminated arry of parameters names/values tuples

arg.name: output
arg.info: the URL/filename ot the generated resource if available

arg.name: SAX
arg.info: a SAX handler for progressive callback output (not implemented yet)

arg.name: IObuf
arg.info: an output buffer for progressive output (not implemented yet)

function.name: xsltSaveProfiling
function.info: Save the profiling informations on output

arg.name: output
arg.info: a FILE * for saving the informations

function.name: xsltSaveResultTo
function.info: Save the result result obtained by applying the style stylesheet to an I/O output channel buf

return.info: the number of byte written or -1 in case of failure.

function.name: xsltSaveResultToFd
function.info: Save the result result obtained by applying the style stylesheet to an open file descriptor This does not close the descriptor.

return.info: the number of bytes written or -1 in case of failure.

function.name: xsltSaveResultToFile
function.info: Save the result result obtained by applying the style stylesheet to an open FILE * I/O. This does not close the FILE file

return.info: the number of bytes written or -1 in case of failure.

function.name: xsltSaveResultToFilename
function.info: Save the result result obtained by applying the style stylesheet to a file or URL

return.info: the number of byte written or -1 in case of failure.

function.name: xsltSetGenericDebugFunc
function.info: Function to reset the handler and the error context for out of context error messages. This simply means that handler will be called for subsequent error messages while not parsing or validating. And ctx will be passed as first argument to handler One can simply force messages to be emitted to another FILE * than stderr by setting ctx to this file handle and handler to NULL.

function.name: xsltSetGenericErrorFunc
function.info: Function to reset the handler and the error context for out of context error messages. This simply means that handler will be called for subsequent error messages while not parsing nor validating. And ctx will be passed as first argument to handler One can simply force messages to be emitted to another FILE * than stderr by setting ctx to this file handle and handler to NULL.

function.name: xsltSetXIncludeDefault
function.info: Set whether XInclude should be processed on document being loaded by default

function.name: xsltShutdownCtxtExts
function.info: Shutdown the set of modules loaded

function.name: xsltShutdownExts
function.info: Shutdown the set of modules loaded

function.name: xsltSort
function.info: function attached to xsl:sort nodes, but this should not be called directly

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

functype.name: xsltStyleExtInitFunction
functype.info: A function called at initialization time of an XSLT extension module

arg.name: URI
arg.info: the namespace URI for the extension

functype.name: xsltStyleExtShutdownFunction
functype.info: A function called at shutdown time of an XSLT extension module

arg.name: URI
arg.info: the namespace URI for the extension

arg.name: data
arg.info: the data associated to this module

function.name: xsltStyleGetExtData
function.info: Retrieve the data associated to the extension module in this given stylesheet.

arg.name: URI
arg.info: the URI associated to the exension module

struct.name: xsltStylePreComp
struct.info: The in-memory structure corresponding to XSLT stylesheet constructs precomputed data.

function.name: xsltStylePreCompute
function.info: Precompute an XSLT stylesheet element

function.name: xsltSystemPropertyFunction
function.info: Implement the system-property() XSLT function object system-property(string)

struct.name: xsltTemplate
struct.info: The in-memory structure corresponding to an XSLT Template

function.name: xsltTemplateProcess
function.info: Process the given node and return the new string value.

return.info: the computed tree replacement

function.name: xsltTestCompMatchList
function.info: Test wether the node matches one of the patterns in the list

return.info: 1 if it matches, 0 if it doesn't and -1 in case of failure

function.name: xsltText
function.info: Process the xslt text node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltTimestamp
function.info: Used for gathering profiling data

return.info: the number of tenth of milliseconds since the beginning of the profiling

functype.name: xsltTransformFunction
functype.info: signature of the function associated to elements part of the stylesheet language like xsl:if or xsl:apply-templates.

arg.name: comp
arg.info: the compiled information from the stylesheet

function.name: xsltUnparsedEntityURIFunction
function.info: Implement the unparsed-entity-uri() XSLT function string unparsed-entity-uri(string)

function.name: xsltUnregisterExtModule
function.info: Unregister an XSLT extension module from the library.

return.info: 0 if sucessful, -1 in case of error

function.name: xsltUnregisterExtModuleElement
function.info: Unregisters an extension module element

return.info: 0 if successful, -1 in case of error.

function.name: xsltUnregisterExtModuleFunction
function.info: Unregisters an extension module function

return.info: 0 if successful, -1 in case of error.

function.name: xsltUnregisterExtModuleTopLevel
function.info: Unregisters an extension module top-level element

return.info: 0 if successful, -1 in case of error.

function.name: xsltValueOf
function.info: Process the xslt value-of node on the source node

arg.name: node
arg.info: the node in the source tree.

function.name: xsltVariableLookup
function.info: Search in the Variable array of the context for the given variable value.

return.info: the value or NULL if not found

function.name: xsltXPathFunctionLookup
function.info: This is the entry point when a function is needed by the XPath interpretor.

return.info: the callback function or NULL if not found

arg.name: ctxt
arg.info: a void * but the XSLT transformation context actually

function.name: xsltXPathVariableLookup
function.info: This is the entry point when a varibale is needed by the XPath interpretor.

return.info: the value or NULL if not found

arg.name: ctxt
arg.info: a void * but the the XSLT transformation context actually
